title: The schema api reference manual page should not use hyphens in the example field name
description:
Since we specifically recommend that field names follow these rules:

"Field names should consist of alphanumeric or underscore characters only and not start with a digit."

we shouldn't model different behavior.

comments.content:
Trivial patch fixing the one case I stumbled across, if anyone else knows of any other such examples please let me know.

If I don't hear anything by the weekend I'll commit.

Just changes sell-by to sell_by.
comments.author: Erick Erickson
